description:
The Oinky Doink maids haven’t been acting particularly maid-like lately, and the Creatureland Group has taken notice. They have a week to whip themselves into shape…or else.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Incroyable mais vrai ! Je suis dresseuse de cochons !
Jitsuroku! Buta no Choukyoushi Da Buu!!
The Inside Story! A Drillmaster for the Swine!!
実録! 豚の調教師だブー!!
